summary: Dr. Martinez excels with 93% biomarker testing compliance, 18% above benchmark, while Dr. Williams lags at 62%, representing $180,000 in missed precision therapy opportunities.

financial_impact.math: $180,000/year = 14.5% testing gap (lagging providers) × 35 therapy candidates × $35,000 margin per patient

clinical_impact.description: Optimizing biomarker testing compliance across providers can significantly improve patient outcomes.

metrics.description: Improved progression-free survival with matched therapies
Overall survival benefit with biomarker-matched treatment
Higher objective response rate with matched therapies
Reduced treatment failure rates with precision medicine
Improved quality of life with targeted approaches

peer_comparison.description: Top performing providers exceed 90% biomarker testing compliance by utilizing EMR-integrated reflex testing protocols.

financial_impact.math: $240,000/year = $180,000 direct therapy opportunity + $60,000 clinical trial enrollment
